reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Small Leather Man Purse Bag
reviews.reviewText: A small bag of excellent quality made from high quality material on high quality equipment. That's noticeable. The bag is made in China but the original manufacturer is Great Britain. If this bag was actually made in Great Britain it would cost, I think, at least $150 . Absolute quality from design to seemingly the very last detail including packaging. It comes with a canvas bag for storing the bag when you are not using it with a leather label Ringsun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice looking item, but the zippers need some extra time to get broken in. It's got plenty of room for all your personal stuff. Well, because of the zippers I'm giving this item 4 stars instead of 5, so you might want to look around more before you purchase this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for a man who doesn’t necessarily want a man-bag.
reviews.reviewText: What I really like about this bag is that it is small, yet large enough to hold all of the things that I would typically want to be caring with me. The leather seems to be a very good quality. The shoulder strap is completely adjustable, and the insides of the bag are well-made. I’m not one who necessarily wants to carry a bag, but once I began using this bag, it became very useful for every day carry. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cross body bag
reviews.reviewText: I needed a larger cross body bag to use as a purse with out it being too big. I found that in this bag. It fits all my needed stuff and I have room for a small water bottle too if I need it. It's very sturdy. The only improvement I wish it had was roomier pockets. It really only has 3 good pockets. The others you can use to slide immunization records or a flat phone in but anything bigger then that and it would bulge out. They're also hard to get your hand in. The 3 good pockets are amazing though and therefore worth it for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice bag!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband, it's so nice I wanted to keep for myself, but now he no longer has to hunt for all his gadgets before work in the morning. It has held up well and has received many compliments. Great for keeping glasses, work keys, phone, pens, badges and all that stuff man carry in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to travel.
reviews.reviewText: This one has been very helpful and useful when it comes to travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Measurements are wrong
reviews.reviewText: Very nice item but it's not small. 12inches H x 9.5in W x 5in D.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first man purse
reviews.reviewText: I selected this bag after about three months of research and shopping. I needed to empty my pockets and unload my belt due to orthopedic problems. This bag can be worn cross body or on one shoulder or carried by the handle. It has a good selection of various size pockets that seem to meet my needs extremely well. The leather is very high quality and looks great. I mounted a CC holster in the back compartment with Velcro and it does not “print” at all. I have only been carrying it a few days and it has not seemed to attract any unwanted attention so far.
We bought this as a travel bag. It is a nice leather and is well made. It has a rigid structure and is larger than we thought it would be. It is a good size for a personal bag to take on flights.
Awesome Purse Bag. I use when doing daily errands. The leather feel and quality is top of the line !!!
